channel.title: Creativescape
channel.description: how do i make creativescape source work? i got all parts (server, client and cache) but in what order do i put them and make it work?

item.title: Creativescape
item.dc:creator: @runescapelolz runescapelolz
item.description:
@runescapelolz wrote:

[quote=“stickywicky, post:8, topic:367673”]what?
in my 317 i didnt have a cache folder i hads to put any wear…i had a cache folder only in my client folder and thats it…
so sorry i carnt help[/quote]

its ok i fixed the run.bat, compiler and i can log in now
thanks for your effort

Read full topic

item.title: Creativescape
item.dc:creator: @runescapelolz runescapelolz
item.description:
@runescapelolz wrote:

[quote=“stickywicky, post:6, topic:367673”][quote author=runescapelolz link=topic=463825.msg3392718#msg3392718 date=1289086372]

be more percific
have you tried just running the server and the client and logging in

also… if your new
please! i beg you get a 317

have you added the jdk version ti path variables
i’ve tried to run run.bat but it just says it can’t find the path, same with compiler. even though ive changed the jdk version to the one i have.

yes
[/quote]
so
you added the class paths
you changed the run and compile path
then it should 100% work…

also this may be an issue
what source you using delta PI or 512+
also what op systme are you
windows 7
windows vista
or xp
or mac?[/quote]

its 317 and im using win7

hey dude wait i fixed the run.bat and i got it running but where should i put the cache?

Read full topic
